extendedInfo.description: Super Scratchers is an instant-win lottery-style scratch card game with a twist: every time you play Super Scratchers you improve your chances of winning!Feeling lucky? Think you can win the Golden Scratcher? Install Super Scratchers now and see what your scratch card reveals.  All the fun without the mess.Features:- Instant scratch off game- Unlock scratch cards as you level up- New free credits to unlock to play more scratch off tickets daily- Gain coins, score points, chance to win a super jackpot!Super scratchers is a great solo game to play if you're feeling bored - all the fun of a classic lottery scratch off ticket brought to Android!Super Scratch Offs is brought to you by Super Lucky Casino, makers of popular vegas style casino games like bingo, lottery and scratch card games. Â Watch for games like slots, solitaire, poker and casino royale coming soon.So if you enjoy great games like Uno, Solitaire, and Words with Friends, you'll love Super Scratch Offs!

reviews.title: Kinda good
reviews.comment: It\'s pretty good but could be better like have better animation when scrathing off the tickets
reviews.author: Martha Abernathy

reviews.title: Okay
reviews.comment: Yea Oh Yep Yep Great The best Best Great Great Love this game can\'t play enough
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: This is a very addictive game. Very fun, easy, and perfect to pass your time.
reviews.author: rob obryen

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: This is a great app, kills time and you have fun doing it. I find myself playing several times a day.
reviews.author: Susan Hayes

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: So great and cool soooooooo much fun
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it:-)
reviews.comment: Really fun game wish they had more than just scratch off though but still happy with it:-)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome straight to the point game!
reviews.comment: Just lack of instructions and design could be better. Or else its fun. Get it. Addictive.
reviews.author: vicky-lea thompson

reviews.title: Its something to do
reviews.comment: I don\'t really understand it. Like what\'s the multiplier? Also you just scratch and win what? Credits? To upgrade to a higher chance of winning? Winning what I want to win actual things like money. I don\'t know its ok i guess.
reviews.author: Rebecca Adams

reviews.title: Tiny graphics don\'t fill the screen!
reviews.comment: I love this game, but the graphics are too small on my screen! (galaxy s3) Please fix this so it can be played on devices with larger screens without looking fugly! :) I\'d rate it 5 stars if it weren\'t for the small graphics!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Super Scratch Offs Lotto Games
reviews.comment: It\'s a good game to play, when you have time to kill. It\'s fun to scratch, fun to win, but the mind knows that there\'s no real money involved! Just remember that it\'s just for fun!
reviews.author: Mark T. Larrabee

reviews.title: Super Scratch Off Lotto Game
reviews.comment: This Game for being a \"Lotto game,\" Could use a Bit-more of Excitement or Bonuses in them! I Would like them to Become a lot \"More Addictive\"!! So, I really should just rate it a 3 1/2. But, I\'m \"Hoping\" you guys are gonna \"Have\" Better ones Right?! So, I\'m letting it have 4 stars anyways!!......*From: A \"Would-be\" 5 Star fan*
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Motorola Photon
reviews.comment: It\'s fun enough. I don\'t know what I need ti win Si it\'s pretty much just push instant scratch until I\'m out of credits.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Christy
reviews.comment: Love the game....I just don\'t like that you only get a few coins to play and then you have to wait for an hour before more will regenerate or you can buy more.....ah not.......
reviews.author: Christy Bednarski

reviews.title: Its ok
reviews.comment: Not really sure how to read the card once scratched but it tells you what you\'ve won. And its takes too long to get more free credits after u spend the free10 you receive.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Sucks
reviews.comment: You don\'t even get yo play for 5 mins and you need credits to continue. Not my cup of tea. More games you can play for a lot longer and better set up. I will uninstall for sure....
reviews.author: Misty Stickley

reviews.title: Velvet
reviews.comment: New to me, still feeling it out. Kinda liking it.gotta get through the week for my credits gonna go the distance and see if I am pleased....peace and love.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Lotto Lover
reviews.comment: This is one of the coolest apps out there it really makes you feel like you just got home from the gasstation and bought scrathers.
reviews.author: natalie apodaca

reviews.title: Meh.
reviews.comment: It\'s just ok. Nothing really special other than a way to kill time. No strategy required just press a button to see if you randomly win something.
reviews.author: Andrea Riley

reviews.title: Very enjoyable
reviews.comment: The only reason I didn\'t give it 5 stars is because leveling cards takes a while.
reviews.author: Jeffery Heath II

reviews.title: Amaxxxing:)
reviews.comment: It could take a little less time to regenerate credits though.... Especially at lower levels.... I LOVE the ability to upgrade tickets
reviews.author: Angela Marie
